main event: A witness observed a UFO hovering over Houma, Louisiana on 27 December 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as having white vapor or cloud around it., The UFO performed high-speed maneuvers and emitted smaller objects that detached from it., The sighting lasted for approximately 2-3 minutes., The witness's father, a licensed pilot, also confirmed seeing the object., The report details that there were no photographs or physical evidence of the sighting.
sighted object: a round object with white vapor, emitting smaller objects
witness description: A 16-year-old female observer and her father, a licensed pilot.
